overview: Borhan, Nathan and Ah Cheng are childhood friends who are birds of a feather and share laziness as a trait. They even have the same childhood crush on a girl named Laila. When said girl returned to their village, they jump at the chance to meet her again. But soon, weird happenings began to occur, and supernatural entities begin to make appearances. Is Laila one of them?
title: Hanya Namamu Laila
